articles.author: Melanie Burton
articles.description: Global mining giant Rio Tinto (RIO.AX), which sparked outrage after destroying an ancient Indigenous site in Australia in 2020, faces new pressure from socially conscious investors and lenders, this time on water practices at two of its mines.
articles.title: Rio Tinto wrangles investors over water contamination claims
